title: Ep. 179  Don't Bet Against The Consumer
itunes:title: Don't Bet Against The Consumer
description: Hitha Prabhakar a New York based fashion and retail expert and author of “Black Market Billions: How Organized Retail Crime Funds Terrorists” shares her analysis on Amazon, Target, Wal-Mart, JC Penny and the future for the ultra- luxury retail segment.
